alert.note: Alert for Logan; Polk; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 9:44PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Logan, Polk and Scott Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 944 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Spiro to near Heavener Runestone State Park to 11 miles west of Vandervoort. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mena... Waldron... Mansfield... Hatfield... Vandervoort... Beauchamp... Cossatot River State Park... Mountain Fork... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Mccauley... Shady... Echo... Oliver... Hartley... Morgan Springs... Caney Creek Wilderness... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Cove... Bates... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for western Arkansas.
